name: chr
description: Compile and run Constraint Handling Rules (CHR) in JavaScript

scripts.prepublish: npm run peg && npm run browserify
scripts.browserify-wo-parser: NODE_ENV=browserWithoutParser browserify -t envify -t uglifyify -s CHR src/index.js | uglifyjs > ./dist/chr-wop.js
scripts.browserify-full: NODE_ENV=browser browserify -t envify -t uglifyify -s CHR src/index.js | uglifyjs > ./dist/chr.js
scripts.browserify-console: NODE_ENV=browser browserify -t envify -t uglifyify -s chr2string console.js | uglifyjs > dist/chr2string.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify-parser && npm run browserify-wo-parser && npm run browserify-full && npm run browserify-console
scripts.test: npm run standard && npm run tape
